name: Snowy 3 Pack Sets - LETTERPRESS CHRISTMAS CARDS
description:
Snowy is the theme for the latest addition to our luxury letterpress Christmas greeting card range. These lovelies will certainly bring a smile to many faces this Christmas time. Our 'Snowy', 3 and 6 card packs include the penquin, the inuit and of course everyone's favourite... the polar bear. 2-colour Letterpress printed cards make a great set to send out to your friends and family. As all our letterpress cards, each card is lovingly hand-fed into our antique printing press and printed on bright white eco friendly 100% cotton card.

size: approx. 11cm x 15cm
paper: 100% cotton card, 300gsm
quantity: single card / matching 100% cotton envelope / biodegradable bag

note: all our greeting cards are left blank inside for your personal message. shipped in recycled packaging

name: SNOW SEAL, FOX & POLAR BEAR 3-PACK - LETTERPRESS CHRISTMAS CARDS
description:
simple by design but 'classy' and oh so sweet, 'Faces' is the latest addition to our luxury letterpress Christmas greeting card range. Hidden faces in the snow was the idea behind these 'Faces' cards and who better than a polar bear, a snow fox and a snow seal to put a smile to your loved ones faces this Christmas. Traditional, they're not, but rather pleasantly winterly and they do make a lovely set. As all our letterpress cards, each one is lovingly hand-fed into our antique printing press and printed on bright white eco friendly 100% cotton card.This 3 Pack includes a snow seal, a snow fox and the polar bear. These three 1-colour Letterpress printed cards make a lovely set and will stand out this Christmas. Each card is lovingly hand-fed into our antique printing press and printed on bright white eco friendly 100% cotton card.

size: approx. 11cm x 15cm
paper: 100% cotton card, 300gsm
quantity: single card / matching 100% cotton envelope / biodegradable bag

note: all our greeting cards are left blank inside for your personal message. shipped in recycled packaging.

name: simoni - letterpress mini cards
description:
the little hello with the big impression. kiki petites are our new calling cards from our hand printed luxury social letterpress range. our cute hand drawn illustrations and fonts make these cards stand out. each card is lovingly hand-fed into our antique printing press on eco friendly 100% cotton card.

size: 7cm x 5cm
paper: 100% cotton card, 300gsm
quantity: set of 50 or 100 available

additional quantities are available on request.

please choose from the 6 different styles. this card allows for two lines for your desired details i.e. name + phone number, or name + email. any varation of... skype / instant messenger / blog / homepage or facebook etc. possible note: we will not insert more than one detail per line. aditional finishes such as round corners and edge painting are also available, please select from drop down.

you will receive. a proof by email within 2 working days. once we have received your final approval we will commence printing. please note, further changes or additions are not possible thereafter.

allow 2-3 weeks for printing and shipping. if your order is time sensitive please contact us here before placing your order for a custom price. please do not hesitate to contact us if you need any help or have any questions.

options.name: edge painting (only available on sets of 100 )
